mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID_DESC ( REQ_CD, DESC_SEQ, BID_UID, BID_DESC_TEXT, BID_DESC_MEDIA, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{descSeq}, #{bidUid}, #{bidDescText}, #{bidDescMedia}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BID_DESC WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND DESC_SEQ = #{descSeq} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid}
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", DESC_SEQ AS "descSeq", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_DESC_TEXT AS "bidDescText", BID_DESC_MEDIA AS "bidDescMedia", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID_DESC WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND DESC_SEQ = #{descSeq} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", DESC_SEQ AS "descSeq", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_DESC_TEXT AS "bidDescText", BID_DESC_MEDIA AS "bidDescMedia", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID_DESC WHERE REQ_CD = #{reqCd} AND DESC_SEQ = #{descSeq} AND BID_UID = #{bidUid} FOR UPDATE

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", DESC_SEQ AS "descSeq", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_DESC_TEXT AS "bidDescText", BID_DESC_MEDIA AS "bidDescMedia", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID_DESC WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQ_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqCd}, '%') AND DESC_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{descSeq}, '%') AND BID_UID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidUid}, '%') AND BID_DESC_TEXT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidDescText}, '%') AND BID_DESC_MEDIA LIKE CONCAT('%', #{bidDescMedia}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT REQ_CD AS "reqCd", DESC_SEQ AS "descSeq", BID_UID AS "bidUid", BID_DESC_TEXT AS "bidDescText", BID_DESC_MEDIA AS "bidDescMedia", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM BID_DESC WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${reqCd} ) AND ( ${descSeq} ) AND ( ${bidUid} ) AND ( ${bidDescText} ) AND ( ${bidDescMedia} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BID_DESC_HT ( REQ_CD, DESC_SEQ, BID_UID, BID_DESC_TEXT, BID_DESC_MEDIA, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{descSeq}, #{bidUid}, #{bidDescText}, #{bidDescMedia}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'C' )

INSERT INTO BID_DESC_HT ( REQ_CD, DESC_SEQ, BID_UID, BID_DESC_TEXT, BID_DESC_MEDIA, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{descSeq}, #{bidUid}, #{bidDescText}, #{bidDescMedia}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'U' )

INSERT INTO BID_DESC_HT ( REQ_CD, DESC_SEQ, BID_UID, BID_DESC_TEXT, BID_DESC_MEDIA, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{reqCd}, #{descSeq}, #{bidUid}, #{bidDescText}, #{bidDescMedia}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), 'D' )
